projectsData.title: Fullstack E-commerce webshop
projectsData.description: Fullstack, fully fuctional and responsive E-commerce webshop. With user and admin dashboard for managing orders, stock, users,... It has shopping cart with integrated Paypal Api for making online payments. Users can search and filter products, add them to cart and make purchase with online payment. Admins can edit and list new products, manage sales and users. If you wish to test website as admin login with this credentials: email: admin@admin.com, password: '123456'

technologies.name: ReactJS
technologies.description: Reusable components, context API, hooks and more

technologies.name: NextJS
technologies.description: Setting up project, navigating between pages and data fetching,  dynamic routing, image optimization, SSG and SSR

technologies.name: MongoDB / Mongoose
technologies.description: Save and retrieve data like products, orders and users

technologies.name: Material UI
technologies.description: For building responsive website using custom theme, animation, carousel and more

technologies.name: Deployment
technologies.description: Hosted on Vercel with continuous deployment from Github

features.name: User Registration and Authentication
features.description: Users can register to make future purchase faster. Pages are protected so only authenticated users have access

features.name: Shopping Cart
features.description: Users can add products to cart, update or remove items and make online payment with Paypal and credit card

features.name: User
features.description: Users can visit Order history page to check past purchases. They can rate and review products. On profile page they can change their username, email and password

features.name: Admin Dashboard
features.description: In admin dashboard is possible to see details of past purchases, check and change status of delivery and payment. Admins can add new products or update existing. Admins can also manage and delete users and create new admins.

features.name: SEO
features.description: Dynamic meta tags based on dynamic pages and content

todos.name: Reset Password
todos.description: Need to implement ability to reset forgotten password

todos.name: Email notifications
todos.description: Users will recieve email with specific information when they register, reset password, make purchase

todos.name: PDF Receipt
todos.description: When purchase is made user will receive PDF receipt. And in dashboard they can download recepit
